scripts.build: pnpm --filter=db build && pnpm --filter=api build && pnpm --filter=app build
scripts.dev: pnpm --filter=db build && pnpm --filter=api build && concurrently -n db,api,app -c blue,green,yellow "pnpm --filter=db dev" "pnpm --filter=api dev" "pnpm --filter=app dev"
scripts.start: concurrently -n db,api,app -c blue,green,yellow "pnpm --filter=db start" "pnpm --filter=api start" "pnpm --filter=app start"
scripts.auth:generate: cd apps/api && pnpm dlx @better-auth/cli generate --config src/utils/auth.ts --output ../../packages/db/src/models/auth/schema.ts
